titles.title: A bill for relief of Elvira Arellano.
A bill for relief of Elvira Arellano.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Elvira Arellano to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
